product_name: Green Guru Flash Stem Handlebar Bag - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Made from upcycled materials and built with high-quality workmanship, the Flash Stem Handlebar Bag uses a transparent pocket to keep your phone, GPS or map within easy view while you ride.
short_description: Made from upcycled materials and built with high-quality workmanship, the Flash Stem Handlebar Bag uses a transparent pocket to keep your phone, GPS or map within easy view while you ride.
